record.dc:title: 97HA3 Hixon Mound Site 1HA3, Hamilton County, Tennessee. Feature 52, Fire basin or pit with curbing. Square 26L13. Direction east.
record.wpa:narrative: The rim of the basin is modelled round and stands quite high above Feature 42 on the east side of the basin (about 0.3'). The western edge is slightly above the floor. The floor is generally so irregular that very little significance can be attatched to the fact that the rim is in greater relief on the east than on the west. The basin was filled with fine gray ash.
record.wpa:comments: Two small sherds were collected as field specimens, however the F.S. numbers are not available.
